title: What If (I Told You I Like You)
author: Johnny Orlando, Mackenzie Ziegler
lyrics:
[00:05.32] Let's talk about all the things that we shouldn't talk about
[00:10.31] Those kind of words that will change all the things we talk about
[00:15.36] Tell me, do you ever think of us?
[00:20.36] Should I ask for more or should I stop?
[00:25.15] What if a tomorrow means that we are here together?
[00:30.21] Or what if we are taking chances just to lose it all?
[00:35.48] Am I really crazy thinking 'bout this all together?
[00:40.52] What if I've been missing the writing on the wall?
[00:45.29] What if I say
[00:46.73] I know, you know
[00:49.62] What if I told you I like you?
[00:51.87] We stay, we go
[00:54.79] What if I told you I like you?
[00:56.90] I know, you know
[00:59.91] What if I told you I like you?
[01:02.12] We stay, we go
[01:05.22] What if I told you I like you?
[01:08.53] 
[01:15.60] What if I told you I like you?
[01:18.46] 
[01:25.89] What if I told you I like you?
[01:27.86] I hear everything they saying, saying 'bout us
[01:32.66] It's not about right or wrong, it's about what we love
[01:37.84] Would it be simple or would it be too complicated?
[01:42.91] Should I keep going or maybe it's better to stop?
[01:47.77] What if a tomorrow means that we are here together?
[01:52.71] Or what if we are taking chances just to lose it all?
[01:57.92] Am I really crazy thinking 'bout this all together?
[02:03.04] What if I've been missing the writing on the wall?
[02:07.84] What if I say
[02:09.31] I know, you know
[02:12.25] What if I told you I like you?
[02:14.49] We stay, we go
[02:17.33] What if I told you I like you?
[02:19.47] I know, you know
[02:22.36] What if I told you I like you?
[02:24.50] We stay, we go
[02:27.62] What if I told you I like you?
[02:30.87] 
[02:38.06] What if I told you I like you?
[02:41.63] 
[02:49.37] What if I say
[02:50.95] I know, you know
[02:53.76] What if I told you I like you?
[02:55.80] We stay, we go
[02:58.77] What if I told you I like you?
[03:00.63] I know, you know
[03:03.90] What if I told you I like you?
[03:06.07] We stay, we go
[03:09.35] What if I told you I like you?
[03:12.02] (Yeah, yeah)
[03:16.20] (I like you, woah-oh-oh-oh, yeah)
[03:19.85] What if I told you I like you?
[03:21.81] I know, you know
[03:24.87] What if I told you I like you?
[03:27.11] We stay, we go
[03:29.86] What if I told you I like you?
[03:32.08] Let's talk about all the things that we shouldn't talk about
[03:33.97]
